channel.title: Arkenfox on Tech Shinobi
channel.description: Recent content in Arkenfox on Tech Shinobi

item.title: Experimenting with ThinkPad C13 Yoga
item.description: Recently, I got a new ThinkPad which took Lenovo over 2 month preparing for shipping. For the price, it worth waiting. This is the first Chromebook I’ve ever had, so I did quite a lot experiments with it. Hardware The model is C13 Yoga Chromebook (MORPHIUS) with AMD Athlon gold 3015c (Picasso) 4GB RAM and 32GB eMMc storage. There are multiple variations in C13 models and mine is the lowest-end of them.
